title: I forgot to make a thread about Eurovision
body:
So here are my favourite songs (in order) from 2016 Eurovision Song Contest
(this year was pretty good)

1. Malta
Sung by a woman 6 months pregnant, she absolutely nailed it. V catchy song, I love it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=58YS5m3EYVY

2. Belgium
Super rad retro groove dance, I'm into it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDBjhAGaeWg

3. Spain
A song about failure that did some cool stuff (falling over is a 10/10 dance move)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EgbjNsxehrY

4. Australia
I had no idea who Dami was before this, but she has an incredible voice. I don't enjoy the song so much (WE WOULD HAVE WON IF THE 2ND LINE DIDN'T HAVE FUCKING FACETIME IN IT I SWEAR)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ymFX91HwM0

5. France
Everything was just pretty rad, dug the French, dug the English, dug the display; dug it all.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-aLPsiyavcU

6. Russia
Putin sent his finest magician to perform magic and music.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e94dst20C9Y

7. Cyprus
Something a little less homo.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idUxTqmCFR0

8. Bulgaria
I like glow arrow lady, she was cool.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PQqUTigWKHY
